name: bmad-copilot
description: Integrate BMAD-METHOD agents and workflows into GitHub Copilot Chat via slash commands.

chatParticipants.name: bmad
chatParticipants.description: Run BMAD agents and workflows in Copilot Chat. Try /help to get started.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Show available BMAD commands and usage examples

commands.name: doctor
commands.description: Diagnose BMAD installation: workspace path, detected files, errors

commands.name: list
commands.description: List available agents or workflows. Usage: /list agents | /list workflows

commands.name: run
commands.description: Run an agent or workflow. Usage: /run agent <name> | /run workflow <name> | /run <name>

commands.name: agents
commands.description: List agents or run one. Usage: /agents | /agents <name> "<task>"

commands.name: workflows
commands.description: List workflows or run one. Usage: /workflows | /workflows <name> "<task>"

bmad.rootPath.description: Explicit path to the BMAD root directory (e.g. _bmad). Leave empty for auto-detection.

bmad.autoDetect.description: Automatically detect BMAD installation in the workspace.
